overview:
Angela Kinsella serves as Senior Director of Business Development at Evolve Media, responsible for global business development efforts across Evolve’s suite of products, publishing divisions and affiliate portfolios. Working closely with Evolve’s CEO and President, Angela develops and executes on strategies to grow Evolve’s business through affiliations of marquee global publishers, strategic partnerships with third party vendors, particularly in the mobile space and the management of Evolve’s esteemed publisher portfolio.

In addition to the above, Angela oversees a team of over 10 employees worldwide, including publisher account management and new publisher development, focusing closely on establishing best practices for partner affiliation, contract management and the deployment of Evolve’s products.

Prior to her current position, Angela was formerly Director of Business Development for Gorilla Nation, a division of Evolve Media, supporting the Gorilla Nation publisher portfolio of over 100 leading entertainment and lifestyle brands. During this time, Angela was responsible for building and affiliating partners for GN Kids and Teens, a multi-million dollar division of the Evolve business.

Angela holds a BA in Communications from Northeastern University.
